quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm – Winston Churchill
fact: Cranberries are sorted for ripeness by bouncing them; a fully ripened cranberry can be dribbled like a basketball.
joke: In the news a courtroom artist was arrested today, I'm not surprised, he always seemed sketchy.
